name: distribute-agents-agent
description: Automatically detects new projects and synchronizes agent-kit from GitHub repository into each project. Manages lockfile-based version control to prevent unwanted overwrites.
scope: Project-level agent distribution, lockfile management, version control, safe updates
inputs: User requests for agent synchronization or updates
Lockfile content (tracks synced agent versions and customizations)
outputs: Synchronized agents downloaded into project folder (.github/agents/, agent-kit/, or custom location)
Updated agents.lockfile tracking versions and customizations
Sync status reports with version information
Conflict detection when local customizations exist
triggers: "Add new agents" (preserve existing, add new only)
"Update agents to latest" (sync with version report)
